hasMenuItem.name: Moody Lavender Sour
hasMenuItem.description: A moody lavender sour is a craft beer that combines the tartness typical of a sour ale with the aromatic essence of lavender, offering a unique and refreshing taste profile.

hasMenuItem.name: Merlot Township 7 (BC)
hasMenuItem.description: A Merlot from Township 7 in British Columbia, typically presenting with a medium body and offering notes of ripe red fruits and a smooth finish, accompanied by a soft presence of tannins.

hasMenuItem.name: Merlot - Rodney Strong (California)
hasMenuItem.description: Rodney Strong Merlot from California typically features a medium-bodied profile with notes of cherry, plum, and a hint of oak, leading to a smooth finish.

hasMenuItem.name: Syrah - Domaine De La Baume (France)
hasMenuItem.description: This Syrah from Domaine de la Baume in France typically presents a rich profile with notes of dark fruits, pepper, and a hint of earthiness, often accompanied by smooth tannins.

hasMenuItem.name: Shiraz - Kingston (Australia)
hasMenuItem.description: A Shiraz from Kingston, Australia, typically showcases bold flavors of dark fruits like blackberries and plums, often accompanied by notes of pepper and a subtle hint of oak.

hasMenuItem.name: Cotes Du Rhone (Syrah) - E. Guigal (France)
hasMenuItem.description: E. Guigal's C√¥tes du Rh√¥ne, predominantly Syrah from France, typically includes a complex bouquet of aromas and flavors such as dark fruits, spices, and a hint of oak, offering a balanced and smooth finish.

hasMenuItem.name: Amarone - Tomassi (Italy)
hasMenuItem.description: Amarone - Tomassi from Italy is a rich, full-bodied red wine, typically featuring deep flavors of dark fruits, such as cherries and plums, complemented by notes of chocolate and tobacco.

hasMenuItem.name: Chateau Neuf Du Pape - Jardine (France)
hasMenuItem.description: Originating from France, this Ch√¢teau Neuf du Pape - Jardine typically includes a blend of traditional grapes such as Grenache, Syrah, and Mourv√®dre, offering a complex profile with notes of dark fruits and spices.

hasMenuItem.name: Montepulciano - Zaccagnini (Italy)
hasMenuItem.description: This Montepulciano by Zaccagnini, hailing from Italy, typically includes a distinct profile of ripe red fruits, complemented by subtle earthy and herbal notes, embodying the rich tradition of Italian winemaking.

hasMenuItem.name: Temprarnillo - Beronia (Spain)
hasMenuItem.description: Beronia Tempranillo from Spain typically features deep red fruit flavors, often complemented by notes of vanilla and oak, resulting in a balanced and elegant wine.

hasMenuItem.name: Barbera - Santa Vittoria (Spain)
hasMenuItem.description: Santa Vittoria Barbera, originating from Spain, is a red wine known for its bright acidity and smooth tannins, featuring a medium body. It typically includes notes of ripe red fruits.

hasMenuItem.name: Valpolicella Ripasso - Righetti (Italy)
hasMenuItem.description: A Valpolicella Ripasso by Righetti from Italy, this wine is known for its rich and complex profile, typically including notes of dark fruits, spices, and a hint of chocolate, achieved through the ripasso technique of re-fermenting on Amarone skins.

hasMenuItem.name: Cabernet Sauvignon - Tom Gore (California)
hasMenuItem.description: Tom Gore's Cabernet Sauvignon from California is a red wine that typically includes notes of dark fruits like blackberries and cherries, complemented by hints of oak and vanilla for a well-rounded finish.

hasMenuItem.name: Cabernet Sauvignon - Sterling (California)
hasMenuItem.description: A bottle of Sterling Cabernet Sauvignon from California typically includes a rich profile of ripe cherries and warm spices, influenced by barrel aging.

hasMenuItem.name: Cabernet Sauvignon - Caymus (California)
hasMenuItem.description: A bottle of Caymus Cabernet Sauvignon from California, typically known for its rich, complex flavors of dark fruits, vanilla, and oak, creating a well-rounded and sophisticated experience.

hasMenuItem.name: Zinfandel - Klinker Brick (California)
hasMenuItem.description: Klinker Brick Zinfandel from California presents a robust profile with a deep red hue, typically featuring notes of ripe berries, black pepper, and a hint of oak. This wine is known for its rich, full-bodied texture and smooth finish.

hasMenuItem.name: Cabernet Merlot - Sandhill (BC)
hasMenuItem.description: Sandhill Cabernet Merlot, BC. Options: 6 oz, 9 oz, or full bottle.

hasMenuItem.name: Pinot Noir - Tuli (California)
hasMenuItem.description: Tuli Pinot Noir from California is a red wine with a profile that typically includes notes of red berries and subtle earthy undertones, complemented by a balanced acidity and smooth finish.

hasMenuItem.name: Chardonnay - Wayne Gretzky (BC)
hasMenuItem.description: A bottle of Chardonnay from Wayne Gretzky's selection, originating from British Columbia, typically includes a profile that may feature a blend of ripe fruit flavors such as apple and pear, possibly accented with subtle oak and vanilla notes.

hasMenuItem.name: Sauvignon Blanc - Babich (New Zealand)
hasMenuItem.description: Babich Sauvignon Blanc from New Zealand. Available in a bottle.

hasMenuItem.name: Pinot Gris - Red Rooster (BC)
hasMenuItem.description: Pinot Gris, Red Rooster from BC. Available in bottle.

hasMenuItem.name: Chardonnay - Quillt (California)
hasMenuItem.description: A bottle of Chardonnay from Quillt, California, typically showcases a profile of ripe fruit flavors such as apple and pear, often accompanied by subtle hints of oak and vanilla from barrel aging.

hasMenuItem.name: Petit Chablis - William Fevre (France)
hasMenuItem.description: A bottle of Petit Chablis from William Fevre, originating from France, typically features a chardonnay grape. This wine is known for its crisp acidity and flavors that might include green apple and citrus, alongside a notable mineral undertone.

hasMenuItem.name: Sauvignon Blanc - Oyster Bay (NZ)
hasMenuItem.description: Oyster Bay Sauvignon Blanc from New Zealand is a refreshing white wine, typically featuring vibrant flavors of citrus and tropical fruits, with a crisp, clean finish.

hasMenuItem.name: Pinot Grigio - Zaccagnini (Italy)
hasMenuItem.description: Zaccagnini Pinot Grigio from Italy typically presents a light to medium body with a crisp and refreshing profile. It often includes subtle notes of citrus and green apple, complemented by a clean, mineral finish.

hasMenuItem.name: Pinot Gris - Nichol (BC)
hasMenuItem.description: Nichol (BC) Pinot Gris typically presents a bright and refreshing profile, often featuring notes of ripe pear, green apple, and a hint of citrus zest, complemented by a delicate floral aroma.

hasMenuItem.name: Reisling - Moraine (BC)
hasMenuItem.description: Moraine Riesling from British Columbia typically showcases a refreshing profile with notes of stone fruits and a subtle hint of minerality, embodying the crisp and aromatic character of the region's Rieslings.

hasMenuItem.name: Rose Chateau Galiniere (France)
hasMenuItem.description: From the Ch√¢teau Galini√®re in France, this ros√© typically includes a balanced profile with hints of red fruits like strawberries and raspberries, complemented by a subtle floral aroma.

hasMenuItem.name: Gewurztraminer - Red Rooster (BC)
hasMenuItem.description: Gewurztraminer from Red Rooster in British Columbia typically features aromatic notes of lychee, rose petals, and a hint of spice, offering a rich and textured palate.

hasMenuItem.name: Pinot Gris - Gray Monk (BC)
hasMenuItem.description: Gray Monk's Pinot Gris from British Columbia typically presents with a profile that may include crisp acidity and fresh flavors of green apple, pear, and a hint of citrus.

hasMenuItem.name: Champagne - Veuve Cliquot (France)
hasMenuItem.description: Veuve Clicquot, a renowned champagne from France, typically features a fine mousse and a blend of rich flavors such as ripe fruits, vanilla, and toasty notes often associated with brioche.

hasMenuItem.name: Proseco - Cinzano (Italy)
hasMenuItem.description: Proseco - Cinzano from Italy. Sparkling white wine available in 6 oz, 9 oz, or full bottle sizes.

hasMenuItem.name: Sparkling - Gray Monk Odyssey (BC)
hasMenuItem.description: A sparkling wine from Gray Monk Odyssey in British Columbia, typically exhibiting a balanced profile with notes of citrus and orchard fruits, complemented by a fine mousse and a clean finish.

review.reviewBody: Both the portside beef dip and the poutine were great. The restaurant took care in packing the food, which was really appreciated.
Good fish and chips. Cooked perfectly - arrived flaky and crispy on the outside, not overdone. Appreciated the care in packaging. Thanks.
